General.Name: Super Energy Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Super Energy Tbk, through its subsidiaries, engages in the production, distribution, and sale of compressed natural gas (CNG) in Indonesia. The company processes natural gas into condensate, liquefied petroleum gas, and lean gas. It also trades in and distributes LNG and CNG; offers natural gas transportation services, as well as consulting services in the energy sector; and operates CNG station. The company was incorporated in 2011 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia. PT Super Energy Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Super Capital Indonesia.

2.Name: Mr. Iwan Gogo Bonardo Parsaulian Panjaitan
2.Title: Operational Director & Director
